faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach us via email at support@example.com.

faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: We are open Monday to Friday, from 9 AM to 6 PM.

faqs.question: Where is your company located?
faqs.answer: Our headquarters is located at 123 Business St, Cityville, Country.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries. Shipping fees may vary depending on the destination.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order has been shipped, we will send you a tracking number via email.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

faqs.question: Can I change or cancel my order after placing it?
faqs.answer: Once an order is placed, it cannot be changed or canceled. Please double-check your order before submitting.

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gift cards that can be purchased online through our website.

faqs.question: Are your products covered by a warranty?
faqs.answer: Yes, all of our products come with a one-year warranty against manufacturing defects.

faqs.question: How can I leave feedback for your products or services?
faqs.answer: We value customer feedback. You can leave your feedback via the 'Contact Us' form on our website or email us directly at feedback@example.com.
